Package javelin.controller.event.urban

Class UrbanEvents

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.event.EventDealer
      • javelin.controller.event.urban.UrbanEvents
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class UrbanEvents
extends EventDealer
    Events that happens autonously per Town regardless of it being hostile or not. Players will be notified of events in non-hostile Towns regardless of having a Squad present or not. For hostile towns, they are only notified if present.
    See Also:
    Location.ishostile(), Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • newinstance

        protected EventCard newinstance​(java.lang.Class<? extends EventCard> type)
                         throws java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Description copied from class: EventDealer
        Given a type of card, instantiate it. Subclasses may have different Constructors so this allows the execution of the proper reflection operations. This is only responsible for returning a Constructor.newInstance(Object...). Other operations, such as validation are performed elsewhere.

        newinstance in class EventDealer
        Throws:
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
